instructions:
In a 4 quart pot sauté the onions in the drippings and water for 4 minutes. Add Kielbasa pieces and
continue sautéing for an additional 5 minutes. Add Potato soup. Stir in small amounts of milk until smooth
and all milk has been added. Continue heating to serving temperature. Makes 5 servings. Garnish each
serving with a pat of butter and coarse ground pepper.
ingredients: 2 medium onions, sliced 1/8 inch and quartered
1/3 lb Kielbasa sausage (quartered lengthwise and sliced 1/8 inch)
2 cans (10 oz ea) Campbell's Cream of Potato soup
name: Potato And Kielbasa Soup
creator: Jim Decker
